sqlMap.insert: insert into nboard(unq, title, pass, name, content, hits, rdate) values(board_seq.nextval, #title#, #pass#, #name#, #content#, 0, sysdate)
sqlMap.select: select b.* from ( select rownum rn, a.* from (select rownum, unq, title, name, hits, to_char(rdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate from nboard order by unq desc) a) b where rn >=11 and rn <=20
